theseAreMyContactPages: These are my contact pages, in my github you can see all my projects.
profile: JavaScript web developer with emphasis on MERN stack, use of agile SCRUM methodologies and web development tools like React, Node.js, TypeScript. Chemical engineer with good logic and programming background (Matlab, simulink, Wolfram).
elearningDescription: Development of an E-learning platform for 6 months.
elearningResponsibilities1: ◦Implementation of multi-tenant architecture for the management of multiple clients on the same platform.
elearningResponsibilities2: ◦Development of real-time payment functionalities using payment gateways and websockets.
elearningResponsibilities3: ◦Integration with AWS for file storage (S3), lambda function (MediaConvert)  and content delivery (CloudFront).
elearningResponsibilities4: ◦Creation of unit tests and documentation with Swagger.
backofficeDescription: Creation of a backoffice system for the management of internal operations, lasting 9 months.
backofficeResponsibilities1: ◦Development of advanced data structures such as binary and multilevel trees for user management.
backofficeResponsibilities2: ◦Implementation of payment methods in cryptocurrencies, management of wallets and transfers.
backofficeResponsibilities4: ◦Technical documentation using JSDoc and React Hook Form for form validation.
researchGroup: Research Group: Process design and use of biomass. IDAB.
quickCallDescription: Intermediary page between specialized professionals and clients, in domestic tasks such as electrical, plumbing, mechanics, among others.
miAppDescription: My app is a page that offers students and teachers a tool to be able to do online tests. The platform allows the management of courses and tests simultaneously.

miAppCharacteristics5: Use of SCRUM tools (Jira) and Figma
